evaluations.opinion: Alibabaâ€™s entry into the smartâ€‘glasses market signals a genuine expansion of the sector, which had been dominated by Metaâ€™s early attempts.
Projected global sales of AI smart glasses will exceed 10â€¯million units by next year, indicating strong market momentum.
Smart glasses are viewed as a promising future device due to their handsâ€‘free information display and AI integration.

confirmed_facts: Alibaba launched the Quark AI glasses for sale in China in July 2025.
The glasses are priced at 3,799â€¯yuan (â‰ˆ78,600â€¯KRW) and 1,899â€¯yuan (â‰ˆ39,300â€¯KRW).

They include Alibabaâ€™s AI chatbot Qwen AI, voice control, a camera for product price detection via Taobao, and features such as realâ€‘time translation, AIâ€‘generated meeting notes, and virtualâ€‘assistant queries.

timeline.event: Alibaba announced the Quark AI glasses and began sales in China.
CNBC reported that Alibabaâ€™s Quark AI glasses are now available for purchase.
Meta released the Rayâ€‘Ban Display glasses, a $799 AIâ€‘enabled smartâ€‘glasses model.
Xiaomi and Baidu launched their own AIâ€‘based smart glasses in China.
Alibaba plans to roll out the Quark AI glasses globally.
